item.title: F: Graphics 2 (Category Compilation) #07～#13
item.description:
In Category F: Graphics, I explain what goes into making art for games. Rather than sharing tool tutorials and the like, I offer practical points to consider when creating game visuals.
[Index] 0:00 Opening 0:11 F-07 The Basics of Pixel Art 3:05 F-08 Unifying Visual Style 5:47 F-09 A Fight Between Live Action and Animation 10:14 F-10 Do Graphics Impact Fun? 13:01 F-11 Odds and Ends of Supervising 24:50 F-12 Making Things Look Miniature 27:15 F-13 Dealing With Color Disparity
[Playlist F: Graphics] https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgKCjZ2WsVLSO4Zq-JuJzGvhTe1QqRSZ5
item.author: (Masahiro Sakurai on Creating Games)

item.title: Large Chainsaw Model
item.description: The powered chainsaw was developed nearly a century ago. Its rise in prevalence has fundamentally changed the shape of human work in forestry and logging industries. But when was the last time you personally needed to use a chainsaw in your daily life?

item.title: the tech utopia fantasy is over
item.description: i talk about how the idea of a humanity-saving tech revolution from the usual tech suspects is dead (for me).
